nodes.text: The Mandalorian: The Path of the Force

The Mandalorian: The Path of the Force is a forthcoming World of Reading Level 2 young readers book by Brooke Vitale that adapts events from the second season of The Mandalorian television series. It is scheduled to be published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on January 11, 2022.
Meet the cast of characters from Star Wars: The Mandalorian!

This Level 2 reader introduces young fans to memorable moments from the smash hit television series on Disney+, The Mandalorian! With dynamic full-color art and a story geared to help with reading, kids will love following along with some of their favorite action from season two.
